oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Councilmen Charles R. Bramwell and Aubrey D. Gillem with Nashville map at Annex Avenue, March 29, 1961
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Councilmen Charles R. Bramwell and Aubrey D. Gillem with Nashville map at Annex Avenue on March 29, 1961. When this photo was taken, the City of Nashville was annexing large portions of Davidson County. The map in the picture shows sections of the county that were proposed for annexation. b & w; 8 x 10 in.
